channel.title: Questionnaire v2
channel.description:
Hello guys, some of you may know by now that I'm working on creating what I hope to be a mind-blowing server with the help of a mind-blowing team.
Here is my second questionnaire (First is here - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667475.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667475.0.html[/url]).
[u][b]Starter[/b][/u]
1) What should the Starter pack roughly include and allow you to do?
[u][b]Summoning[/b][/u]
2) Summoning or no summoning? 3) Summoning in PvP or only outside PvP?
[u][b]XP[/b][/u]
4) Should certain skills have faster XP rates than others, I was considering making combat skills faster than non-combat skills? (E.G - Woodcutting would be slower than Strength)
[u][b]PvP[/b][/u]
5) Should I include new armour/weapons on my RSPS? (E.G - Torva, Chaotics, Korsai etc.) 6) Do you enjoy RSPS's with a "PK Point" System? (E.G - 1 Kill = 1 Point, Korsai costs x PK Points to purchase) 7) Any special PvP features you've experienced and enjoyed in the past on RSPS's? (E.G - K/D Ratio's, Leader boards etc.) 8) Should I include Duelling in my RSPS? 9) Should I have a "custom" PvP zone or the normal "wildy" PvP? (E.G - Edgeville) [u][b] Skills[/b][/u]
10) Should there be an in game leaerboard with players' total points? 11) Any skilling related features you've really enjoyed in the past on RSPS's? 12) How long should it take to "max" a single non combat skill (E.G - Fishing) or should they all take different times? 13) Working rune crafting with/without shops or just a rune shop?
[u][b]Donation[/b][/u]
14) If any, what donator "perks" should be available? (E.G - Access to skilling close to a bank, secluded monsters in "donor zone")

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Starter

  1. What should the Starter pack roughly include and allow you to do?
    Enough to allow a user to start training various skills which will help get them on their feet on the server. Don’t give them much, if any gold.

Summoning

  1. Summoning or no summoning? If you can implement it properly, sure. Why not.
  2. Summoning in PvP or only outside PvP? Outside of PvP.

XP

  1. Should certain skills have faster XP rates than others, I was considering making combat skills faster than non-combat skills? (E.G - Woodcutting would be slower than Strength) I’d say the more monotonous skills should have a slightly higher XP rate than more exciting skills. Personal opinion though.

PvP

  1. Should I include new armour/weapons on my RSPS? (E.G - Torva, Chaotics, Korsai etc.) Depends on the server.

  2. Do you enjoy RSPS’s with a “PK Point” System? (E.G - 1 Kill = 1 Point, Korsai costs x PK Points to purchase) No, it just feels like a one-dimensional server to me. If you want a PvP-only oriented server, then it’s fine, but otherwise it’s not a good idea.

  3. Any special PvP features you’ve experienced and enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? (E.G - K/D Ratio’s, Leader boards etc.) Leader boards is a fine idea.

  4. Should I include Duelling in my RSPS? Of course, it’s a great part of the game and gives people an increased feeling of safety.

  5. Should I have a “custom” PvP zone or the normal “wildy” PvP? (E.G - Edgeville) Normal wilderness.

Skills

  1. Should there be an in game leaerboard with players’ total points? An online one would be better, but both are as effective.

  2. Any skilling related features you’ve really enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? Anything to do with woodcutting, fishing, etc is good fun.

  3. How long should it take to “max” a single non combat skill (E.G - Fishing) or should they all take different times? They should all take different times, not really sure how long is ideal. A few days is a fun challenge but it depends on the nature of the server.

  4. Working rune crafting with/without shops or just a rune shop? Runecrafting should have a shop but it shouldn’t be the central part of that skill. Real money should be made off of the player trading if that’s what you’re asking.

Donation

14) If any, what donator “perks” should be available? (E.G - Access to skilling close to a bank, secluded monsters in “donor zone”) I don’t like in-game donator benefits, so no comment.

Read full topic

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @Jarker994 Jarker994
item.description:
@Jarker994 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:13, topic:548610”]if you plan to implement pk points/values you first need to think of an intelligent way to combat pvp farming. so far, ive yet to see a generic system that can stop a user with two clients/vpn.

of course, youll never be able to fully combat it. but the slower you get it the better.

also, you could make a simple cash sink method by allowing the conversion of pk points to cash and vice versa. (ex trading 100 pk points getting 1m. // spending 1m getting 25pk points) idk a good rate tbh depends of item prices/eco stability

this opens the shop items to pk points or coins.[/quote]

Thanks again Vain_, I completely agree with you. So far I haven’t liked PK Point systems because it seems to be very hard to combat the abuse of the system. I guess you could stop multi logging from one IP. That’s a simple fix but it certainly doesn’t fix all the other possible variants of abuse.

The idea of converting Cash to PK points is a nice idea as from my research a lot of people have told me that they don’t like PK Point systems because they feel it stops people that aren’t into PvP so much getting certain items and I do see their point. This could be a nice way around it for sure.

Really, really good points. Thanks for your time Vain_.

Keep the responses coming in guys, this is really helping me!

Read full topic

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

if you plan to implement pk points/values you first need to think of an intelligent way to combat pvp farming. so far, ive yet to see a generic system that can stop a user with two clients/vpn.

of course, youll never be able to fully combat it. but the slower you get it the better.

also, you could make a simple cash sink method by allowing the conversion of pk points to cash and vice versa. (ex trading 100 pk points getting 1m. // spending 1m getting 25pk points) idk a good rate tbh depends of item prices/eco stability

this opens the shop items to pk points or coins.

Read full topic

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Starter

  1. What should the Starter pack roughly include and allow you to do?max everything starting donator points

Summoning

  1. Summoning or no summoning? donator only
  2. Summoning in PvP or only outside PvP? super donator can summon anywhere

XP

  1. Should certain skills have faster XP rates than others, I was considering making combat skills faster than non-combat skills? (E.G - Woodcutting would be slower than Strength) donators should get double exp

PvP

  1. Should I include new armour/weapons on my RSPS? (E.G - Torva, Chaotics, Korsai etc.) donators should have extra stuff
  2. Do you enjoy RSPS’s with a “PK Point” System? (E.G - 1 Kill = 1 Point, Korsai costs x PK Points to purchase) donators should get double pk points
  3. Any special PvP features you’ve experienced and enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? (E.G - K/D Ratio’s, Leader boards etc.) donators should have access to highscore
  4. Should I include Duelling in my RSPS? donator only
  5. Should I have a “custom” PvP zone or the normal “wildy” PvP? (E.G - Edgeville) donator zone

Skills

  1. Should there be an in game leaerboard with players’ total points? donator only
  2. Any skilling related features you’ve really enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? donator rank
  3. How long should it take to “max” a single non combat skill (E.G - Fishing) or should they all take different times? max out start
  4. Working rune crafting with/without shops or just a rune shop? donators get 99

Donation

  1. If any, what donator “perks” should be available? (E.G - Access to skilling close to a bank, secluded monsters in “donor zone”) buying points and items

Read full topic

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Starter

  1. What should the Starter pack roughly include and allow you to do?
    fuckin nothing

Summoning

no

XP

Pick a universal rate.

PvP

5) Should I include new armour/weapons on my RSPS? (E.G - Torva, Chaotics, Korsai etc.)
Hold votes for shit like this, later in the servers life.

6) Do you enjoy RSPS’s with a “PK Point” System? (E.G - 1 Kill = 1 Point, Korsai costs x PK Points to purchase)
ya, 1 pt per kill, make shit cost atleast 500.

7) Any special PvP features you’ve experienced and enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? (E.G - K/D Ratio’s, Leader boards etc.)
k/d is cool, never used the other shit when it’s been on a server.

8) Should I include Duelling in my RSPS?
Only if you’ve perfected it and there aren’t any dupes, pointless otherwise, unless you mean RSC like duelling.

9) Should I have a “custom” PvP zone or the normal “wildy” PvP? (E.G - Edgeville)
normal zones


Skills

10) Should there be an in game leaerboard with players’ total points?
no that’s called high scores, no point trying to re-invent the wheel for something as small as thuis

11) Any skilling related features you’ve really enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s?
Cut tree = logs, dont add extra ghey shiz

12) How long should it take to “max” a single non combat skill (E.G - Fishing) or should they all take different times?
3 - 5 days PER skill

13) Working rune crafting with/without shops or just a rune shop?
r00n sh0p

Donation

14) If any, what donator “perks” should be available? (E.G - Access to skilling close to a bank, secluded monsters in “donor zone”)
Keep donation rewards as close to a vanity category as possible, i.e titles, non-combat items etc, donating should be donating, not paying money in return for 1337 weapunz

Read full topic

item.title: Questionnaire v2
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Starter

  1. What should the Starter pack roughly include and allow you to do?
    A starter pack should include maybe 1,000 gp and BASIC gear for combat and basic skills.

Summoning

  1. Summoning or no summoning?
    Summoning.

  2. Summoning in PvP or only outside PvP?
    Only outside of PvP.

XP

  1. Should certain skills have faster XP rates than others, I was considering making combat skills faster than non-combat skills? (E.G - Woodcutting would be slower than Strength)
    I think you should just choose an xp rate and make it universal.

PvP

  1. Should I include new armour/weapons on my RSPS? (E.G - Torva, Chaotics, Korsai etc.)
    I don’t tend to play revisions that aren’t high enough to have them anyways, so yeah.

  2. Do you enjoy RSPS’s with a “PK Point” System? (E.G - 1 Kill = 1 Point, Korsai costs x PK Points to purchase)
    Not really. I don’t think people should be REQUIRED to PvP to obtain specific gear. Isn’t it enough that they are getting the other person’s loot?

  3. Any special PvP features you’ve experienced and enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s? (E.G - K/D Ratio’s, Leader boards etc.)
    Nope.

  4. Should I include Duelling in my RSPS?
    Yes, and it should be available anywhere.

  5. Should I have a “custom” PvP zone or the normal “wildy” PvP? (E.G - Edgeville)
    Normal wildy. If people want to fight then they know where to go.


Skills

  1. Should there be an in game leaerboard with players’ total points?
    Only if you don’t plan to make a forum with a leaderboard there.

  2. Any skilling related features you’ve really enjoyed in the past on RSPS’s?
    [b]The ability to “bury all” for bones makes new players want to pick up regular and big bones. A functional toolbelt would be an excellent addition to any server. Bonfires are the only way I will train firemaking in an RSPS, so I would say that is probably a good feature.

  3. How long should it take to “max” a single non combat skill (E.G - Fishing) or should they all take different times?
    [b]To me, they should all take different times. I have always enjoyed just experiencing an xp rate and not having variables changed to that extent.

  4. Working rune crafting with/without shops or just a rune shop?
    The rune shop should not have more than two thousand of each elemental, and a couple hundred of each catalytic rune. Put runes into monster drops and maybe increase the base rate of each rune crafted to 5 instead of 1, so by 99 you are making 25 airs per essence instead of 10.

Donation

  1. If any, what donator “perks” should be available? (E.G - Access to skilling close to a bank, secluded monsters in “donor zone”)
    See my answer to the last survey.

Read full topic
